name: Origami Village
description:
In Origami Letter, you play as a letter that's visiting a cute village in the clouds. 

As you're on your way to the post office, you’ll see some inhabitants that could use the help of your origami skills.

The world is made out of paper. Fold your world and solve peoples problems !

Fold your world with Origami ! 

• 6 unique origami affecting the world in their own ways.
• Collect piece of papers to unlock new origami.

Chill and relax !
• With many feel good interaction scattered around the islands.
• Talk to the villagers and help them


Exploring the island :
• Touch or press the ground to move your character.
• Near a npc or interactible object touch the bubble to interact with it.

Folding Origami :
• Press to grab a corner
• Slide to confirm the fold
